text: Michael Glassock (born 4 November 1999), is an Australian professional soccer player who plays as a central defender and is currently a free agent. ==Career== ===Pegasus=== Glassock was announced as a Pegasus player on 16 July 2019. However, his stay in Hong Kong was cut short due to the 2020 coronavirus pandemic which caused the 2019–20 season to be suspended. On 8 April 2020, Glasscock agreed to a mutual termination with Pegasus. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Australian soccer players Category:Association football defenders Category:Central Coast Mariners FC players Category:Hong Kong Pegasus FC players Category:Hong Kong Premier League players
title: Michael Glassock
